name: API Docs
summary: Hosted public API documentation for every OAS (Swagger) and RAML spec out there.
details: Hosted public API documentation for every OAS (Swagger) and RAML spec out there.

name: Apiary
summary: Apiary.io is a hosted suite of tools that help companies build web APIs quickly, test and monitor them easily and document them effortlessly. It provides API owners with necessary infrastructure and helps them build relationship with their users. Core of the self-service solution is API Blueprint, an efficient format for describing an API, aspiring to define new gold standard for REST API developm
details: Apiary.io is a hosted suite of tools that help companies build web APIs quickly, test and monitor them easily and document them effortlessly. It provides API owners with necessary infrastructure and helps them build relationship with their users. Core of the self-service solution is API Blueprint, an efficient format for describing an API, aspiring to define new gold standard for REST API development. The product uses this Blueprint to streamline adoption of new services and simplify integration to other systems.

name: Apidox
summary: Apidox is a free to use, open source application. Code released under the MIT license. Contact, support and error reporting on GitHub.
details: Apidox is a free to use, open source application. Code released under the MIT license. Contact, support and error reporting on GitHub.

name: APIEmbed
summary: Auto-generated code snippets in many programming languages for your website, blog or API documentation.
details: Auto-generated code snippets in many programming languages for your website, blog or API documentation.

name: Atlassian Confluence
summary: Confluence is a wiki used by more than half of Fortune 100 companies to connect people with the content and co-workers they need to get their jobs done, faster. Connect your entire business in one place online to collaborate and capture knowledge u0026ndash; create, share, and discuss your documents, ideas, minutes, and projects.
details: Confluence is a wiki used by more than half of Fortune 100 companies to connect people with the content and co-workers they need to get their jobs done, faster. Connect your entire business in one place online to collaborate and capture knowledge u0026ndash; create, share, and discuss your documents, ideas, minutes, and projects.

name: Dexy
summary: Dexy helps your code to speak for itself. Show off your code with beautiful syntax highlighting. Write examples and Dexy will run them, inserting the output into any document you wish. Everything is based on live code, so updating is easy, syntax errors blow up on you, not your users, and typos are a thing of the past. With Dexy's smart caching, your code is only executed when it needs updating, s
details: Dexy helps your code to speak for itself. Show off your code with beautiful syntax highlighting. Write examples and Dexy will run them, inserting the output into any document you wish. Everything is based on live code, so updating is easy, syntax errors blow up on you, not your users, and typos are a thing of the past. With Dexy's smart caching, your code is only executed when it needs updating, saving you time while keeping your documents robust.

name: Gelato.io
summary: Gelato.io is a tool focused on creating API Documentation and Developer Portals. You can describe your API, import and sync with Swagger or API Blueprint, have your developers register and get updates when things change, get an automatic API Explorer.
details: Gelato.io is a tool focused on creating API Documentation and Developer Portals. You can describe your API, import and sync with Swagger or API Blueprint, have your developers register and get updates when things change, get an automatic API Explorer.

name: Read the Docs
summary: Read the Docs hosts documentation, making it fully searchable and easy to find. You can import your docs using any major version control system, including Mercurial, Git, Subversion, and Bazaar. We support webhooks so your docs get built when you commit code. There's also support for versioning so you can build docs from tags and branches of your code in your repository.
details: Read the Docs hosts documentation, making it fully searchable and easy to find. You can import your docs using any major version control system, including Mercurial, Git, Subversion, and Bazaar. We support webhooks so your docs get built when you commit code. There's also support for versioning so you can build docs from tags and branches of your code in your repository.

name: ReadMe.io
summary: ReadMe is a developer hub for your startup or code. It's a completely customizable and collaborative place for documentation, support, key generation and more. Don't waste your precious time reimplementing a dev.yourstartup.com. If you have an API, code library, or affiliate program, documentation is hard. Users can't use your product without understanding it, and most documentation on the Interne
details: ReadMe is a developer hub for your startup or code. It's a completely customizable and collaborative place for documentation, support, key generation and more. Don't waste your precious time reimplementing a dev.yourstartup.com. If you have an API, code library, or affiliate program, documentation is hard. Users can't use your product without understanding it, and most documentation on the Internet is lacking. The goal of ReadMe is to make consuming APIs completely painless.

name: REST United
summary: Our mission is to help REST API providers easily create SDKs in different programming languages with easy-to-follow documentation and code samples while software developers can effortlessly consume the REST API by following the SDK installation instruction and using the code samples within minutes.
details: Our mission is to help REST API providers easily create SDKs in different programming languages with easy-to-follow documentation and code samples while software developers can effortlessly consume the REST API by following the SDK installation instruction and using the code samples within minutes.

details: SDK Bridgeu0026nbsp;is a company that specializes in explaining technology through documentation and software development kits. It provides a variety of API-related services including:nnAPI DocumentationnSample code and tutorialsnHighly technical copywritingnTraining sessions on how to use software platformsnTechnology classes for youthnnThese services can be a critical piece of delivering your API. SDK Bridge says that it is au0026nbsp;bridge between people and technology. So very true.nSDK Bridgeu0026nbsp;provides a set of services that any business looking to deliver an API should evaluate. Even though you many be able to generate your own marketing materials, SDK and other supporting API documents, you may find more value bring in an outside perspective to make sure you explain how your API solves problems, adds value, and can be successfully integrated to customers systems.
